import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {
  
  public static void main(String[] args) {
    Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);
    int t = in.nextInt();
    for (int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
      int N = in.nextInt();
      int A = in.nextInt();
      int B = in.nextInt();
      int C = in.nextInt();
      long res = 0;
      for (int a = 0; a <= Math.min(N,A); a++) {
        for (int b = 0; b <= Math.min(N - a, B); b++) {
          res += Math.min(N - a - b, C) + 1;
        }
      }
      System.out.println(res);
    }
  }
}
